**Describe the maintenance task**
A clear and concise description of what needs to be done (e.g., dependency update, code refactor, documentation cleanup).

**Tasks to Perform**
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
- [ ] Task 3

**Expected Outcome**
What will be improved or fixed by completing this maintenance task.

**Additional Notes**
Any other context, links, or resources related to this maintenance task.
